data.comment: Today's referee, Evgeni Turbin, has blown to start the match.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
In the minute 2, Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Goal! Ural Yekaterinburg have got their heads in front thanks to a Vyacheslav Podberezkin strike.
Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
In the minute 10, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Krasnodar.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Evgeni Turbin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Evgeni Turbin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Krasnodar's Cristian Ramirez gets in a shot on goal at Central Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg surge into the attack at Central Stadium but Vladimir Rykovâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Important block from the Ural Yekaterinburg defence as Shapi Suleymanov fires in a strike for Krasnodar.
Evgeni Turbin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Krasnodar.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Kaio Pantaleao (Krasnodar) has received a first yellow card.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Evgeni Turbin signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
In the minute 27, Krasnodar's Kaio Pantaleao goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 28, Evgeni Turbin awards the home team a throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg are coming forward and Andrey Egorychev gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
In the minute 29, Evgeni Turbin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 33, Evgeni Turbin waits before resuming play because Danijel Miskic for Ural Yekaterinburg is still down.
Danijel Miskic has recovered and rejoins the match in Ekaterinburg.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Krasnodar push forward at Central Stadium and Marcus Berg gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Ural Yekaterinburg defence.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
The first half has been concluded at Central Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Central Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
The away team have replaced Maksim Kutovoy with Viktor Claesson. This is the first substitution made today by Murad Olegovich Musaev.
The away team replace Shapi Suleymanov with Tonny Vilhena.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Krasnodar's Viktor Claesson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Ural Yekaterinburg are on the attack at Central Stadium, where Eric Bicfalvi is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Great shot from Krasnodar's Viktor Claesson but he is denied by the crossbar.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
In the minute 52, Ural Yekaterinburg are pushing forward but Rafal Augustyniak's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Krasnodar's Kaio Pantaleao has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
In the minute 55, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg make their first substitution with Dmitri Efremov replacing Vyacheslav Podberezkin.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Daniil Utkin is booked for the away team.
Kristoffer Olsson for Krasnodar has been booked by Evgeni Turbin and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 58, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Eric Bicfalvi (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Tonny Vilhena of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Evgeni Turbin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Murad Olegovich Musaev is making the team's third substitution at Central Stadium with Egor Sorokin replacing Daniil Utkin.
In the minute 60, Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a fourth substitution, with Sergei Petrov replacing Igor Smolnikov.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 61, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Viktor Claesson (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Vladimir Rykov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ural Yekaterinburgâ€™s Vladimir Rykov is on his feet again at Central Stadium.
In the minute 63, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Krasnodar's Cristian Ramirez misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Yuri Gazinskiy (Krasnodar) has received a yellow card from Evgeni Turbin.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 70, Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
Andrey Panyukov (Ural Yekaterinburg) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 71, Evgeni Turbin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
David Karaev is replacing Andrey Panyukov for the home team.
Alex Matsukatov is replacing Kristoffer Olsson for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
In the minute 75, Marcus Berg gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Evgeni Turbin awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Igor Kalinin for Ural Yekaterinburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Igor Kalinin for Ural Yekaterinburg is back on the field again.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Central Stadium.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Ural Yekaterinburg are whistled for offside.
Roman Emeljanov is on a sub for Danijel Miskic for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Evgeni Turbin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In the minute 86, Dmitri Efremov (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets a yellow card.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Dmitri Efremov is back in action after a slight knock.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dmitri Efremov.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
At Central Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Eric Bicfalvi for Ural Yekaterinburg is whistled offside.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Krasnodar have an attacking throw-in.
Cristian Ramirez (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Evgeni Turbin.
Evgeni Turbin signals a free kick to Krasnodar just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Alex Matsukatov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Ilya Pomazun (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets a yellow card.
